title: Gold 4 (peak Gold 1/plat promos) LFT - Top laner
body: Hi all, I peaked a few weeks ago at plat promos after which i played on awful ping for a bit (which I've now resolved), so I'm considering joining a reasonably serious ranked team. I'm currently gold 4, however I'm an exceptional team player so I believe on a premade team i can perform at a high standard, I main riven in solo queue but also have a large champion pool of tanks, and I keep up with meta such as lane swap starts and double jungling. Add in-game (Spaghini) if youre interested. Cheers :)

replies.body: Looking for team posts don't get too far here from what I have seen. :(
